characteristics.climate: Extremely cold, with long winters and short summers
elements: Ice Frozen essence of winter, wielder of chilling touch and frostbite.
Air Invisible force of life, carrier of whispers and secrets.
Earth Immovable foundation, embodying strength and permanence.
Snow: Pristine velvet of winter, symbol of purity and transformation.
Cold: Inescapable chill, the biting force of winter and preservation.
